snippet.title: Bravely Second: End Layer - 'Darkness Threatens' Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Don't miss this action-packed game trailer of Bravely Second: End Layer only for the Nintendo 3DS family of systems.

Dare to risk it all again in Bravely Second: End Layer: http://bravelysecond.nintendo.com/

Check out more at: http://www.nintendo.com/



Bravely Second: End Layer is a Japanese role-playing video game developed by Silicon Studio and published by Square Enix for the Nintendo 3DS family of systems, and is the sequel to Bravely Default. It was released by Square Enix in Japan on April 23, 2015, and was released by Nintendo in North America, Europe, and Australia in 2016.

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com
